title: Custom Scaling Toggle
name: devpixelsperpx-toggle-custom
description: This addon allows you to quickly cycle between different interface zoom levels of your choice.
author: Roope Salmi

preferences.name: values
preferences.title: List of scaling amounts
preferences.description: Provide a comma-seperated list of the options you want to be able to cycle through in addition to the unset value. (1.0 is equivalent to the default value)

preferences.name: col_seed
preferences.title: Status color seed
preferences.description: This value is used to determine the color of the status badge. Change the value to customize your palette!

preferences.name: state
preferences.title: State of scaling
preferences.description: This setting is normally controlled from the cycle button.
